Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Event
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IncomingListener.IncomingEvent, OutgoingListener.OutgoingEvent
    Enclosing interface:
    ExchangeListener
    public abstract static class ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent
extends Event
    Like ExchangeListener, this class should not be used directly as this is just a base class to statically tie together IncomingListener.IncomingEvent and OutgoingListener.OutgoingEvent with a common API.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int NON_APPLICABLE_REQUEST_ID
      Return value of requestId() if type() is ExchangeListener.Type.NOTIFICATION.
      static UUID NON_APPLICABLE_UUID
      Value used in place of null, either indicating that descUuid() isn't used for the ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent because target() is ExchangeListener.Target.CHARACTERISTIC.

      The UUID of the descriptor associated with this ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent.
      boolean isFor​(String macAddress)  
      boolean isFor​(UUID uuid)  
      String macAddress()
      Returns the mac address of the client peripheral that we are exchanging data with.
      BluetoothDevice nativeDevice()
      Returns the native bluetooth device object representing the client making the request.
      int offset()
      The offset forwarded from the native stack.
      int requestId()
      The request id forwarded from the native stack.
      boolean responseNeeded()
      Dictates whether a response is needed.
      BleServer server()
      The BleServer this ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent is for.

      The UUID of the service associated with this ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent.
      ExchangeListener.Target target()
      The type of GATT object this ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent is for, characteristic or descriptor.

    • Field Detail

      • NON_APPLICABLE_UUID

        public static final UUID NON_APPLICABLE_UUID
        Value used in place of null, either indicating that descUuid() isn't used for the ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent because target() is ExchangeListener.Target.CHARACTERISTIC.

      • NON_APPLICABLE_REQUEST_ID

        public static final int NON_APPLICABLE_REQUEST_ID
        Return value of requestId() if type() is ExchangeListener.Type.NOTIFICATION.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • server

        public final BleServer server()
        The BleServer this ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent is for.

      • macAddress

        public final String macAddress()
        Returns the mac address of the client peripheral that we are exchanging data with.

      • nativeDevice

        public final BluetoothDevice nativeDevice()
        Returns the native bluetooth device object representing the client making the request.

      • type

        public final ExchangeListener.Type type()
        The type of operation, read or write.

      • target

        public final ExchangeListener.Target target()
        The type of GATT object this ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent is for, characteristic or descriptor.

      • serviceUuid

        public final UUID serviceUuid()
        The UUID of the service associated with this ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent.

      • charUuid

        public final UUID charUuid()
        The UUID of the characteristic associated with this ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent. This will always be a valid UUID, even if target() is ExchangeListener.Target.DESCRIPTOR.

      • descUuid

        public final UUID descUuid()
        The UUID of the descriptor associated with this ExchangeListener.ExchangeEvent. If target() is ExchangeListener.Target.CHARACTERISTIC then this will be referentially equal (i.e. you can use == to compare) to NON_APPLICABLE_UUID.

      • data_received

        public final byte[] data_received()
        The data received from the client if type() is ExchangeListener.Type.isWrite(), otherwise an empty byte array. This is in contrast to OutgoingListener.OutgoingEvent.data_sent() if type() is ExchangeListener.Type.isRead().

      • requestId

        public final int requestId()
        The request id forwarded from the native stack. See various methods of BluetoothGattServerCallback for explanation. Not relevant if type() ExchangeListener.Type.isNotificationOrIndication() is true.

      • offset

        public final int offset()
        The offset forwarded from the native stack. See various methods of BluetoothGattServerCallback for explanation. Not relevant if type() ExchangeListener.Type.isNotificationOrIndication() is true.

      • responseNeeded

        public final boolean responseNeeded()
        Dictates whether a response is needed. Not relevant if type() ExchangeListener.Type.isNotificationOrIndication() is true.

      • isFor

        public final boolean isFor​(String macAddress)

      • isFor

        public final boolean isFor​(UUID uuid)
